body.name: Dove Ultra Care Shampoo Coconut and Hydration for Dry Hair Shampoo with Oil Blend of Coconut, Jojoba & Sweet Almond 25.4 oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 33 mins
features: HYDRATING SHAMPOO: Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Shampoo cleanses, hydrates, and nourishes dry hair to leave it feeling soft and smooth.
OIL BLEND: This shampoo is made with a unique oil blend of coconut, jojoba, and sweet almond for beautifully healthy hair that's nourished from root to tip.
92% NATURAL ORIGIN FORMULA: 92% of this hair care formula is of natural origin, meaning it's unchanged from nature or, after some processing, keeps over 50% of its original structure.
REFRESHING SCENT: This hydrating shampoo is infused with a revitalizing coconut water and fresh lime scent to lift your mood and leave your hair refreshed with every wash.
COCONUT & HYDRATION SYSTEM: Dove Coconut & Hydration is a hydrating shampoo and conditioner system that locks in moisture and nourishes dry hair, leaving it soft, smooth, and beautiful.
THOUGHTFULLY MADE: This shampoo for dry hair is Certified Cruelty-Free by PETA and is made in 100% recycled plastic bottles.
body.description: If you're looking for beautifully scented and soft hair that’s deeply nourished and perfectly smooth, this hydrating shampoo is the perfect addition to your hair care routine. Infused with a refreshing coconut water and sweet lime scent, Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Shampoo cleanses, hydrates, and nourishes dry hair to leave it feeling soft and smooth. Formulated with an oil blend of Coconut, Jojoba, and Sweet Almond, this caring and moisturizing shampoo locks in essential moisture for beautifully healthy hair that’s nourished from root to tip. 92% of our formula, including water, is of natural origin, meaning it's unchanged from nature or, after some processing, keeps over 50% of its original structure. As well as caring for your hair, Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Shampoo smells heavenly too. The refreshing scent of hydrating coconut water and sweet lime lifts your mood as well as leaves your hair refreshed with every wash. How to use: Apply Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Shampoo to wet hair, enjoy the creamy lather and uplifting fragrance, and then rinse. For best results and constantly hydrated hair, use this shampoo daily and follow up with Dove Ultra Care Coconut & Hydration Conditioner. Dove care goes further than hair care with PETA Cruelty-Free certification and 100% recycled plastic bottles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dove Nourishing Secrets Coconut & Hydration Shampoo nourishes your locks leaving them feeling soft and smooth. Formulated with our Nutritive Serum, this moisturizing shampoo locks in essential moisture for beautifully healthy hair that's nourished from root to tip.

Deep Nourishment The lightweight formula won't weigh hair down. It's progressively nourishing so your hair gets better and better with every wash. The Dove Difference From the beginning, Dove has always drawn inspiration from real, diverse women. We celebrate real beauty, which we define as feeling and looking your best. Dove Nourishing Secrets Dove Nourishing Secrets Collection is inspired by caring rituals from women around the world. It combines intense nourishment with nature inspired ingredients. Cruelty-Free & 100% Recyclable Bottles Dove care goes beyond just your hair. This cruelty-free conditioner is the perfect addition to your cruelty-free beauty collection - just check out its PETA cruelty-free certified logo. Plus, we are now moving all our bottles to 100% recycled plastic.

Dove Nourishing Secrets Coconut & Hydration Conditioner Dove Nourishing Secrets Thickening Ritual Shampoo Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo, 31 oz Main Benefit Dove Coconut & Hydration Conditioner locks in moisture and nourishes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and beautiful. Dove Intensive Repair Shampoo visibly repairs damage to regenrate the healthy look and feel of hair. Dove Daily Moisture Shampoo moisturizes your hair to leave it soft, smooth, and manageable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Satisfied with smell, softness and moisture.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love Dove and love all their products!! Love this Shampoo, is the best I ever used. Definitely recommend to everyone!!!😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars pump is awesome
reviews.reviewText: great smell, not too strong. Gets rid of oils without being drying- my hair is less frizzy using this. I also love the pump feature, it’s so convenient. Great Size for family and at a good price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I just started using it 2 days ago and my hair already better than before more soft and silky. Defenitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the scent, it’s so crisp and fresh
reviews.reviewText: I love Dove shampoo, so when makers of Dove came out with this new scented shampoo I had to give it a try. I will say, I Love the scent and it keeps my hair cleaner longer. It doesn’t smell one bit like coconut, it’s between floral and crisp scent. Not over powering and it last for awhile. Stocking up on these before the prices go up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: It has a great scent, so fresh and soothing! Leaves my hair soft and smelling good till at least two days after using it. I had tried the Dove Oxygen shampoo, however, it left my hair super rough and damaged (split ends and dryness) thankfully this shampoo reversed those effects and I got my old smooth hair back :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really great moisturizing shampoo
reviews.reviewText: Really great moisturizing shampoo that I found using for the last couple of days my hair feels a lot less brittle and dried out which I was skeptical about but pleasantly surprised that it looks and feels a lot better. Excellent Dove!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dove makes the BEST products
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE Dove shampoo. I was raised on Dove bar soap (I"m old enough that that's what soap was...a bar), and I'm still in love with Dove products, especially their shampoo/conditioner. I've tried other brands, more expensive brands, but I do so love Dove shampoo. I have thick, long-ish hair and Dove always leaves it smelling fresh, shiny, and manageable. And you can't beat the price on this GIANT bottle of shampoo, trust me, I looked and compared by oz. per price. We order several at a time so we never run out (and it's just two of us, my bathroom cabinet isn't too happy about it though). If you like Panetene, give Dove a try, I honestly can say of the two, Dove blows Pantene out of the water.
